inputs.selection_motivation: The US Chip Export Agreement directly sets the terms and restrictions governing the export of AI chips to China, thereby shaping the flow of US-China AI chip exports. Linking the agreement to the trade flow node enables precise modeling of policy impact on export volumes and composition.
inputs.candidate_motivation: These topics are the strongest direct peers or influences because they encapsulate policy instruments, tariffs, and geopolitical dynamics that directly affect semiconductor exports and related agreements.

proposed_link.motivation: The US Chip Export Agreement directly sets the terms and restrictions governing the export of AI chips to China, thereby shaping the flow of US-China AI chip exports. Linking the agreement to the trade flow node enables precise modeling of policy impact on export volumes and composition.
